title: DealX
details: A full stack project using MERN stack. Users can buy or sell used products on this site. Admin can delete any buyer , seller or product and can verify any seller. Buyer can buy or report a product. A seller can add , advertise or delete his product. Every user will see interface and routes according to their role.

title: PCFix
details: A full stack PC parts servicing project using MERN stack. Users can buy or sell a service. They can review others services . They can also see ,  edit or delete their reviews. User can add new service. Any one can view reviews on a particular service.

title: World Cup Stream
details: A front-end sports streaming project using plain HTML and  CSS. Users can see live matches and upcoming matches on this site(UI only). Animations were added where needed.
